name: The 5th International Conference on Business and Social Science
content: Dear Sir/Madam Greeting from The 5th International Conference on Business and Social Science (2017 ICBASS) Please add the following information on your webpage for advertisement of conference. Name of conference: The 5th International Conference on Business and Social Science (2017 ICBASS) Date(s) of conference: March 29-31, 2017 Full location details: Nagoya, Japan Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Abstract/Paper Submission Deadline December 10th, 2016 Notification of Acceptance December 25th, 2016 Final Abstract/ Full Paper Submission Deadline January 15th, 2017 Registration Deadline January 15th, 2017 Conference Date March 29-31, 2017 Website link: http://icbass.org/ Contact details: icbass@icbass.org Organized by Higher Education Forum 12-1F.,No.129,Sec.1,Fuxing S.Rd.,Taipei,Taiwan http://www.prohef.org/ Tel:+886227401498 Fax:+886227522642 Courtyard By NAGOYA CONGRESS CENTER 1-1 Atsuta-nishimachi, Atsuta-ku, Nagoya 456-0036
